TopicTitle: "Eve: Order Zero" -- a KSP Graphic Novel (POSTLUDE COMPLETE...bet you didn't see THAT coming.)

Articles.Content: Okay this is getting cringey now... Stahp.

One shudders to imagine what inkerbal thoughts lie behind Kenlie's face... What dreams of chronic and sustained fiction...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-25T02:22:17Z" title="09/25/2015 02:22  AM" data-short="8 yr">September 25, 2015</time> by wx7**

Kenlie's fanfic just keeps getting better and better.

If he keeps improving, he may be as good as your son one day.

Happy landings!
I am scared of no fiction, but that... Thing, it sp00ks me.

This is *totally* normal.

Heh... Heh...
Give Kenlie a desk job....if he is allowed to survive this ordeal.

> 
> Give Kenlie a desk job....if he is allowed to survive this ordeal.

Bad writing is no reason to ruin Kerbfleet's perfect safety record! 

![LG4uKXL.png](http://i.imgur.com/LG4uKXL.png)

![WK9Hcrp.png](http://i.imgur.com/WK9Hcrp.png)

Foist!

Also, what about the tourists?
The bloaking device!

This is getting fun. 

- Raincrafter, the totally awesome youtuber who is getting more awesome every second.
Hmm... Looks like Kenlie will be a celebrated author by the time the Eve crew gets back home!

......Fine. He lives.......unless he ticks off the two women.

*Hell hath no fury like a woman (or Kerbilina) scorned!*

> And so it was' date=' [s']Jebe Larrysue Kerman, the first Kerbal on the MoonMun. He stood in front of his gigantic space ship, that was not compensating for anything, as his little brother Bob Rob watched from the television, not getting as much attention! The camera he set up took several pictures. He was even on the cover of Teen Face Magazine. And then there was Mr. Feldrik, who taught him in school, who was so mad he died of anger when he realized that he was wrong to give JeLarrysue all Fs. He then...

> ...and there she was' date=' using a laser gun to inscribe "[s']CidrikGalvin and ValentinaMarrysue Kerman Forever" on the surface of Jool.

When Bill found both of those books in high school, he managed to get Jeb and Val to do his english homework by means of blackmail.

So, like, Kenlie isn't alone.

Probodobodyne always gave vague warnings of probe sentience... Maybe the Jool or Dres missions will feature probes as characters.

Janny and Kathra kerman look like clones.

> Janny and Kathra kerman look like clones.

They *ALL* look like clones to us.

- - - Updated - - -

Dres mission should be a B-plot for a future story, where the total and complete lack of interestingness of Dres is emphasized, until something very strange happens to the Dres crew that leads back into the main story.

Put *Kenlie* on the Dres mission. Yeah.

> 
> They *ALL* look like clones to us.
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Dres mission should be a B-plot for a future story, where the total and complete lack of interestingness of Dres is emphasized, until something very strange happens to the Dres crew that leads back into the main story.
> 
> Put *Kenlie* on the Dres mission. Yeah.

Right, it'll be Kenlie, Gregmore, Newdun, and the two science kerbelles. None of them have a distinctive dialect or an orange suit, and there's be only two different speech balloon colors among the five of them. And I'll do the whole thing without character portraits so you'll just have to guess who's speaking based on which end of the Brutalist-designed ship the words are coming out of. Fun galore!

> 
> They *ALL* look like clones to us.

- - - Updated - - -

I know, but I mean look at them!

Same position, same facial expression, same haircut. 

Do they ever laugh, become scared or tilt their heads like other kerbals? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif):confused:

Things are just about where I want them to be now around Kerbin. I should be able to land the Gliido (or try to) next game session, and after that we'll get back to the main story. Currently 20 days from planar correction burns for Eve...

Good grief, is Kenlie making a collection of cringy tropes ? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

And yeah, those Lookies are Evil! Evil, I say ... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

P.S So it is now official that lil'Enzie was part of the Duna mission ? That patch is not the fake version Jeb and co gave him ( it only has 4 kerbals , unlike the fake one that had 5 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) )

I love how distracted Kenlie is by Martystu and his exploits.

I'm sure you would never get distracted by thinking about your writing when you should be doing something else. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

At least Kenlie did actually get the patch out of that encounter with Jeb and Bill.

Happy landings!

I'm pretty much going down the bad fanfiction trope list and checking them off, so yeah ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) and sorry, that is the fake--it's just too small to see well. I copied it in from the "soooo cool" panel.

> 
> I'm sure you would never get distracted by thinking about your writing when you should be doing something else. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It's a level worse than that, I'm thinking about writing Kenlie's writing when I should be playing KSP instead of doing what I'm supposed to be doing!

In universe character death by author, lolwut......

Then again, unless unless Kenlies fan-fic universe has a life support mod, his character won't actually die from lack of oxygen or freezing to death.

Kenlie, the Clo-I mean (twin?) Kerbelles and that guy who was on a Munbase for three years would be a good combo for a mission, the Kerbelles are very unique, Kenlie is, well, Kenlie and the Munbase guy kind of reminds me of Dilsby, he could be a great commander!
